DOC.criteria: Provision inform consent Female male age 18 year Histologic cytologic confirmation advance gastric cancer Stage IIIIV ( AJCC 7th ) ECOG : 02 Have tumor sample test BRCA1 mRNA expression Negative pregnancy test woman childbearing potential Neutrophile granulocyte great 1.5×10^9/L Hemoglobin great 10g/dL Platelet great 100×10^9/L Serum bilirubin great 1.5x upper limit reference range ( ULRR ) ALT AST great 1.5x ULRR Creatinine clearance less 60ml/min Have least another primary malignant tumor Active infection Chemotherapy experimental drug within 3 week start study therapy Women pregnant breast feed Weight loss great 10 % within 6 week start study therapy
